text: We Can't Believe G - Eazy Actually Got Away With This Rock Star Move At Airport Security You pretty much know you've made when you can use a magazine cover shoot as ID, and it works. We can't tell if we should be worried or extremely impressed at the'only - a - famous - person - could'stunt G - Eazy pulled at an airport when attempting to get through security. Louisa Johnson Shares Heartfelt Apology For Posting Homophobic Tweets According to his girlfriend and fellow'You And I'singer Halsey who tweeted about the episode, G - Eazy - who we totally didn't realise is in fact called Gerald btw - successfully got through airport security by flashing a magazine cover he was on
